description:

projects: Personal finance and document management app

description:
Designed and implemented software architecture for microservices and frontends using Angular, WPF, and ASP.NET Core.
Maintained and extended the in-house library to improve development efficiency and consistency.

Automated deployments using Docker and Kubernetes for multi-environment orchestration.

Implemented core features with a custom-built library.
Defined and standardized interfaces between existing components and the new system.

Worked part-time implementing software features, contributing to development projects, and collaborating with the team to deliver functional solutions while gaining hands-on experience in software development and project workflows.

Developed MES software for major food industry clients in Switzerland.
Maintained close collaboration with customer processes to ensure tailored solutions.

role: Apprentice Computer Scientist EFZ, software development
description: Completed an apprenticeship in Computer Science, learning foundational software development, IT systems, and programming principles, while gaining practical experience in feature implementation, problem-solving, and project collaboration in a professional environment.
